title: Interactive Quiz for SPL's Internal Event
description: Developed an interactive quiz experience for a Saudi Post Logistics (SPL) internal event. The quiz was centered around a physical "vault" with 200 locked boxes, each associated with a unique barcode that triggered a question when scanned.
shortDescription: An interactive quiz for an SPL event, featuring barcode scanning and a physical vault with prizes.
metaDescription: Discover how an interactive quiz with barcode scanning was developed for Saudi Post Logistics (SPL)'s internal event to engage employees and enhance the experience.
objectives: Create an engaging and interactive experience for SPL employees.
Incorporate gamification elements using a physical vault and barcodes.
Collect user responses and feedback.
Deliver the project within a tight deadline.

functionality.description: Users could scan a barcode on each box to trigger a unique question.
The system displayed the question and provided multiple-choice options.
The user's selected answer was validated in real-time.

If correct, the user received a congratulatory message and the three-digit code to unlock the corresponding box. If incorrect, the user received a "try again" message (later modified to one attempt per question).

design.aesthetic: Clean, intuitive, and engaging, featuring SPL's branding.
design.responsiveness: The application is responsive and functions seamlessly across various devices.

media.url: <iframe src="https://www.linkedin.com/embed/feed/update/urn:li:ugcPost:7249827332100657153?compact=1" height="399" width="90%" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" title="Embedded post"></iframe>
media.alt: Embedded LinkedIn Post showcasing the SPL interactive quiz

outcomes: Successfully engaged SPL employees at the internal event.
Provided a fun and interactive experience.
Demonstrated the ability to deliver a project under tight time constraints.

challenges.challenge: Rapid Development Timeline: The project required completion within a tight deadline to align with the scheduled SPL event.
challenges.solution: Agile Development Methodology: I utilized efficient development practices, including rapid prototyping and iterative development, along with close communication with the client to ensure timely delivery and meet project requirements.

clientFeedback.feedback: The interactive quiz was a hit at our event! Employees loved the gamification elements and the engaging questions. Thank you for delivering such a fun experience within our tight deadline.
clientFeedback.author: SPL Event Coordinator

title: Interactive Booth for PBS Hackathon at BIBAN Forum
description: Created an interactive booth experience for the PBS Hackathon at the BIBAN forum. The installation featured a touch screen display designed to engage visitors and gather their innovative ideas related to specific sectors.
shortDescription: An interactive touch screen booth for a hackathon, collecting user ideas and contact information.
metaDescription: Learn about the interactive touch screen booth developed for the PBS Hackathon at BIBAN Forum, designed to gather innovative ideas in traffic, real estate, and tourism.
objectives: Engage visitors at the BIBAN forum.
Gather innovative ideas related to traffic, real estate, and tourism.
Collect user contact information.
Create a user-friendly and visually appealing touch screen experience.

functionality.description: Displays the title "PBS Hackathon" and three interactive boxes representing different sectors (Traffic, Real Estate, Tourism).
Presents a sector-specific question to the user and allows them to input their answer in a text area.
Collects user's name, email, organization, and mobile number through a form.
Stores user input (sector, answer, and contact details) in a Firebase Realtime Database.

design.aesthetic: Modern and visually engaging, with a gradient background, subtle animations, and a user-friendly interface.
design.responsiveness: The application was designed to be responsive and adapt to different screen sizes.
design.accessibility: The design followed accessibility best practices, with clear text, sufficient color contrast, and keyboard navigation support.

media.alt: Main Screen of the PBS interactive booth (Arabic)
media.caption: Main Screen (Arabic)

media.alt: User Info Screen of the PBS
media.caption: User Info Screen

outcomes: Successfully engaged visitors at the BIBAN forum.
Gathered valuable ideas and contact information.
Demonstrated the ability to create an interactive and user-friendly touch screen experience for a public event.

challenges.challenge: Ensuring data persistence in a potentially offline environment.
challenges.solution: Used localStorage as a fallback to store data locally if the Firebase connection failed.

title: NEXT IPO: Mobile App for Tracking Initial Public Offerings
description: NEXT IPO is a Flutter application designed to track and display information about upcoming Initial Public Offerings (IPOs). The app provides a user-friendly interface to view IPO details, customize settings, and stay updated on the latest offerings.
shortDescription: A Flutter app to track and display information about upcoming IPOs with customizable settings and real-time data.
metaDescription: Explore NEXT IPO, a Flutter mobile app for tracking upcoming IPOs. Features customizable settings, real-time data from the Saudi Exchange, and a user-friendly interface.
objectives: Provide a user-friendly interface to view upcoming IPO details.
Allow users to customize their view by selecting markets and date ranges.
Support multiple languages (English and Arabic).
Fetch real-time IPO data from the Saudi Exchange website.
Implement a responsive design for optimal viewing on various devices.

functionality.description: View upcoming IPOs in an expandable card format.
Choose between dark and light themes for comfortable viewing.
Select specific markets (All, Main Market, Nomu - Parallel Market, Sukuk) and set custom date ranges for IPO listings.
Available in English and Arabic. (coming soon)
Utilizes a staggered grid layout for optimal viewing on various device sizes.
Fetches the latest IPO information and manages cookies for up-to-date listings.

design.aesthetic: Dark mode mobile app with a modern and minimalist design, using a bright yellow accent to highlight important information.
design.responsiveness: Designed for mobile devices, with a clear layout optimized for touch interaction.
design.accessibility: The high contrast between the dark background and light text/icons suggests good readability.

media.alt: Screenshot of the NEXT IPO app showcasing the main screen
media.caption: Screenshot

media.alt: Video demonstration of the NEXT IPO app's features and functionality
media.caption: Video Demonstration

outcomes: Developed a functional Flutter application that displays real-time IPO information.
Implemented user-customizable settings for market selection and date ranges.
Provided a responsive design that adapts to different screen sizes.

challenges.challenge: Web scraping IPO data from the Saudi Exchange website.
challenges.solution: Utilized web scraping techniques, managed cookies, and sent HTTP requests to retrieve up-to-date information.

challenges.challenge: Parsing and formatting retrieved IPO data for display.
challenges.solution: Handled various data fields such as company name, IPO ID, issue price, and offering dates.

notes: This project is for educational purposes only. It is not intended for commercial use or as financial advice.

title: DroneHunter Systems: Real-time Drone Detection and Tracking
description: DroneHunter Systems is a cutting-edge solution for monitoring and securing airspace from unauthorized drones. This is designed to detect, track, and neutralize potential threats from unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs).
shortDescription: A system for real-time drone detection, tracking, and neutralization using advanced sensors and machine learning.
metaDescription: Learn about DroneHunter Systems, a project utilizing Python, YOLOv5, and TensorFlow for real-time detection and tracking of unauthorized drones, enhancing airspace security.
objectives: Develop a system for real-time detection of unauthorized drones.
Implement automated tracking of detected drones.
Create a user-friendly interface for airspace monitoring.
Utilize machine learning for accurate drone identification.

functionality.description: Utilizing advanced sensors and detection algorithms, DroneHunter Systems can identify drones in real-time.
Once a drone is detected, our system automatically tracks its movement across the airspace.
The system provides an intuitive interface for users to monitor the airspace.

design.aesthetic: Dark mode interface with a vibrant orange accent, designed for user engagement and clarity.
design.responsiveness: The design adapts to different screen sizes, particularly with a different layout for screens smaller than 768px wide.
design.accessibility: Some considerations made, such as distinct color contrasts and using semantic HTML elements where possible.

outcomes: Successfully developed a system capable of real-time drone detection and tracking.
Implemented a user-friendly interface for airspace monitoring.
Utilized YOLOv5 and TensorFlow for drone detection and model conversion.

title: AKTSER: AI-Powered Telegram Voice Message Summarizer and Transcriber
description: AKTSER is a Telegram bot that summarizes long voice messages, converts voice to text, and trims silence from audio, saving users time and effort.
shortDescription: A Telegram bot that uses AI to summarize voice messages, transcribe them, and remove silence.
metaDescription: Discover AKTSER, a Telegram bot utilizing AI for voice message summarization, transcription, and silence removal. Built with Python and Google Cloud Speech-to-Text.
objectives: Provide a convenient way to summarize long voice messages on Telegram.
Offer voice-to-text conversion for easier reading and accessibility.
Trim silence from audio messages to improve listening experience.
Support multiple languages for broader usability.

functionality.description: Extracts key points from voice messages using AI.
Transcribes voice messages into readable text.
Removes silent and low-volume parts from voice messages.
Processes voice messages in multiple languages.

design.responsiveness: Adapts to the Telegram app's interface.

media.caption: Audio analysis conducted to optimize silence trimming.

outcomes: Created a functional Telegram bot for summarizing voice messages.
Implemented voice-to-text conversion and audio trimming features.
Conducted audio analysis for optimizing performance.
notes: This project utilizes the Google Cloud Speech-to-Text API for voice processing and is designed for self-hosting using Docker or Python.

title: SPL's Internal Event: Values Challenge
description: Developed an interactive experience for SPL's internal event, featuring seven challenges aligned with the company's core values. Employees engaged in various activities, including puzzle-solving, drawing, scenario-based problem-solving, and a collaborative game, to reinforce their understanding and commitment to SPL's principles.
shortDescription: An interactive experience for SPL's internal event with seven challenges designed to reinforce the company's core values.
metaDescription: Discover the interactive experience created for SPL's internal event, featuring seven challenges that reinforce company values through engaging activities like puzzles, drawing, and collaborative games.
objectives: Reinforce SPL's seven core values among employees.
Create an engaging and interactive experience for the internal event.
Promote teamwork and collaboration through interactive challenges.
Gather employee feedback and insights.
Deliver a high-quality experience within a tight deadline.

functionality.description: A timed puzzle game where employees assemble a picture representing "We move fast."
Employees draw an image representing "We commit to doing more" in three rounds, with the option to improve their drawing in each round.
Employees respond to scenarios related to "We exceed our customers' expectations," with AI evaluating their solutions.
Two players work together, one with instructions and the other interacting with the screen, to complete a task representing "We cooperate and share together."
A platform for employees to anonymously share their thoughts and experiences, representing "We are characterized by trust and transparency."
Employees combine elements related to SPL services and innovative technologies to create and submit new ideas, representing "We innovate solutions for the future."
Employees solve various challenges related to SPL's services and values, representing "We always overcome challenges."

design.aesthetic: Modern, engaging, and aligned with SPL's branding, featuring a dark mode interface with vibrant accents.
design.responsiveness: All applications are responsive and function seamlessly across various devices, including touch screens and mobile devices.
design.accessibility: Designed with accessibility in mind, featuring clear text, sufficient color contrast, and keyboard navigation support.

media.alt: Embedded LinkedIn Post showcasing the SPL interactive challenges

media.caption: "We cooperate and share together" collaborative game

media.alt: User interface for a question that the AI will evaluate
media.caption: "We exceed our customers expectations" scenario-based challenge
"We innovate solutions for the future" idea submission

outcomes: Successfully engaged SPL employees at the internal event.
Reinforced understanding and commitment to SPL's core values.
Provided a fun, interactive, and memorable experience.
Gathered valuable employee feedback and innovative ideas.
Demonstrated the ability to deliver a complex project under tight time constraints.

challenges.challenge: Tight Development Timeline: The project required rapid development and testing to meet the event deadline.
challenges.solution: Utilized agile development methodologies, including rapid prototyping, iterative development, and close communication with the client, to ensure timely delivery.

challenges.challenge: Ensuring Seamless Integration of Diverse Challenges: The project involved creating seven different interactive experiences, each with unique technical requirements.
challenges.solution: Employed a modular design approach and leveraged JavaScript libraries and frameworks to streamline development and ensure seamless integration between the different challenges.

challenges.challenge: Optimizing for Touch Screen Interaction: The event primarily utilized touch screen displays, requiring careful consideration of user interface and user experience design.
challenges.solution: Conducted thorough testing on touch screen devices and implemented responsive design principles to ensure optimal usability and a smooth interactive experience.

clientFeedback.feedback: The interactive challenges were a huge success at our event! Employees loved the engaging activities and how they related to our company values. Thank you for delivering such a fantastic experience within our tight deadline.
clientFeedback.author: SPL Event Coordinator

notes: This project demonstrated the successful integration of various web technologies to create a dynamic and engaging experience for a large-scale internal event. The use of AI, specifically Gemini API, for evaluating scenario-based solutions added an innovative element to the project.
